movies.title: My Mother's Wound
movies.overview: Upon turning eight-teen, Salih leaves the orphanage to find his lost family and begins working in a Serbian farm. Suddenly, at the most unexpected moment he has found a home. Will he ever be able to let go of the ghosts of his past and be happy in this new life? As tension escalates disquieting secrets surface. A gripping tale of family, love and identity, My Mother's Wound follows Salih as he searches for a trail of hope amongst war-torn lives.

movies.title: Annihilation
movies.overview: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition into a mysterious zone where the laws of nature don't apply.
movies.tagline: Fear what's inside.

movies.originalTitle: Anthony Jeselnik: Fire in the Maternity Ward
movies.title: Anthony Jeselnik: Fire in the Maternity Ward
movies.overview: Forging his own comedic boundaries, Anthony Jeselnik revels in getting away with saying things others can't in this stand-up special shot in New York.

movies.title: Anthony Jeselnik: Thoughts and Prayers
movies.overview: There's no subject too dark as the comedian skewers taboos and riffs on national tragedies before pulling back the curtain on his provocative style.

movies.originalTitle: Antoine Griezmann: The Making of a Legend
movies.title: Antoine Griezmann: The Making of a Legend
movies.overview: With heart and determination, Antoine Griezmann overcame his small stature to become one of the world's top soccer players and a World Cup champion.

movies.title: Aníkúlápó
movies.overview: It tells the story of Saro, a man seeking for greener pasture, but unfolding events and his affair with the king's wife, he encounters his untimely death and with Akala, a mystical bird believed to give and take life.
movies.tagline: He who has death in his pouch.

movies.title: Anonymously Yours
movies.overview: After an accidental text message turns into a digital friendship, Vale and Alex start crushing on each other without realizing they've met in real life.

movies.title: Apaharan
movies.overview: Story of a tumultuous and complex relationship between a father (Mohan Agashe) and son (Ajay Devgan), set against the backdrop of a thriving kidnapping industry in the Hindi heartland of Bihar.

movies.title: Apollo 10½:  A Space Age Childhood
movies.overview: A man narrates stories of his life as a 10-year-old boy in 1969 Houston, weaving tales of nostalgia with a fantastical account of a journey to the moon.
movies.tagline: A coming of age story.... the way only Richard Linklater could tell it.

movies.title: Apostle
movies.overview: In 1905, a man travels to a remote island in search of his missing sister who has been kidnapped by a mysterious religious cult.
movies.tagline: Your god can't help you.

movies.title: The Figurine: Araromire
movies.overview: Two buddies and a girl, down on their luck, have their lives changed when one of them discovers a mysterious figurine in an abandoned shrine which, according to legend, bestows seven years of good luck. But no one told them about the next seven years...
movies.tagline: No one told them about the next seven years...

movies.title: Ari Eldjárn: Pardon My Icelandic
movies.overview: Comedian Ari Eldjárn pokes fun at Nordic rivalries, Hollywood’s take on Thor, the whims of toddlers and more.

movies.title: Arlo the Alligator Boy
movies.overview: Upon learning that he is from New York City, a wide-eyed boy, who is half human and half alligator, decides to leave his sheltered life in the swamp and search for his long lost father. A musical adventure.

movies.title: Army of Thieves
movies.overview: A mysterious woman recruits bank teller Ludwig Dieter to lead a group of aspiring thieves on a top-secret heist during the early stages of the zombie apocalypse.
movies.tagline: Before Vegas, one locksmith became a legend.

movies.title: Army of the Dead
movies.overview: Following a zombie outbreak in Las Vegas, a group of mercenaries take the ultimate gamble: venturing into the quarantine zone to pull off the greatest heist ever attempted.
movies.tagline: Survivors take all.

movies.title: Arn: The Knight Templar
movies.overview: Arn, the son of a high-ranking Swedish nobleman is educated in a monastery and sent to the Holy Land as a knight templar to do penance for a forbidden love.
movies.tagline: A Knight in the Holy Land. A Woman in the Frozen North. A War that Kept Them Apart.

movies.title: Arsenio Hall: Smart and Classy
movies.overview: In his first stand-up special, Arsenio Hall discusses getting older, the changing times and culture, social issues and even bothersome baby toes.

movies.title: Article 15
movies.overview: A young IPS officer’s new posting in rural India has him confronting caste disparities and uncomfortable truths in the face of a gruesome crime. When three girls go missing in the fictional village of Lalgaon, two of them are found dead and there is no trace of the third one. Where is she and who is responsible for this heinous act?
movies.tagline: Made a difference, now we will make a difference

movies.title: Aruna & Her Palate
movies.overview: An epidemiologist turns her nationwide bird flu investigation into a chance to sample local delicacies en route, with three friends along for the ride.

movies.title: Birds of the Nile
movies.overview: When a young man leaves his village to realize his potential in Cairo, he encounters conflicts caused by differences in customs and traditions.

movies.title: Ascharya Fuck It
movies.overview: Desire and greed intertwines the lives of a Bollywood star, his chauffeur, a prostitute and her pimp in an unlikely love story.
movies.tagline: Inspired By The Works Of Manto

movies.title: Asinamali
movies.overview: Comrade Washington, a black struggle activist, returns to South Africa to work with convicts to create a musical play. Through personal testimony, song, and dance, the prisoners find resilience, liberation and forgiveness.

movies.title: Stunt School
movies.overview: An aspiring actress is admitted to a prestigious conservatory but must pay her tuition by working as a performer for an unusual company.

movies.title: Asperger's Are Us
movies.overview: For the members of the comedy troupe Asperger’s Are Us, it’s easier to associate with a faceless audience than with their own families. No matter who the crowd, best friends Noah, New Michael, Jack and Ethan have one simple mantra: “We would much rather the audience appreciate us as comedians than people who have overcome adversity.”  In this coming-of-age heartfelt documentary, this band of brothers finds themselves at a crossroad. With real life pulling them apart, they decide to plan one ambitious farewell show before they all go their separate ways. People with Asperger’s don’t deal well with uncertainty, and this is the most uncertain time in their lives.

movies.title: Asterix: The Mansions of the Gods
movies.overview: In order to wipe out the Gaulish village by any means necessary, Caesar plans to absorb the villagers into Roman culture by having an estate built next to the village to start a new Roman colony.

movies.title: Athena
movies.overview: Hours after the tragic death of their youngest brother in unexplained circumstances, three siblings have their lives thrown into chaos.

movies.title: Athlete A
movies.overview: Follow the Indianapolis Star reporters that broke the story about USA Gymnastics doctor Larry Nassar's abuse and hear from gymnasts.
movies.tagline: Was winning worth the cost?

movies.title: Atlantics
movies.overview: Arranged to marry a rich man, young Ada is crushed when her true love goes missing at sea during a migration attempt — until a miracle reunites them.
movies.tagline: Every love story is a ghost story.

movies.title: Capture the Flag
movies.overview: When the brave and determined 12-year-old Mike Goldwing discovers that an eccentric billionaire plans to fly to the moon, steal its vast, valuable natural resources, and destroy the American flag planted by the Apollo XI astronauts during man's historic moon landing, the countdown to a spectacular adventure begins! Mike, teamed with his grandfather, best friends Amy and Marty, and a clever chameleon, blasts off on an incredible moon-bound mission, determined to thwart the billionaire's evil plan, capture the flag, and reunite his family.

movies.title: Attack of the Hollywood Clichés!
movies.overview: Movie stars and members of the film industry make fun of several narrative and visual clichés that are as shocking and aesthetic as they are often truly ridiculous.

movies.title: Audrie & Daisy
movies.overview: A documentary film about three cases of rape, that includes the stories of two American high school students, Audrie Pott and Daisy Coleman. At the time of the sexual assaults, Pott was 15 and Coleman was 14 years old. After the assaults, the victims and their families were subjected to abuse and cyberbullying.
movies.tagline: Shame is trending

movies.title: Aurora
movies.overview: The passenger ship Aurora mysteriously collides into the rocky sea threatening an entire island. A young woman and her sister must both survive by finding the missing dead for a bounty.
movies.tagline: The dead will find their way home

movies.originalTitle: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
movies.title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
movies.overview: As a swingin' fashion photographer by day and a groovy British superagent by night, Austin Powers is the '60s' most shagadelic spy, baby! But can he stop megalomaniac Dr. Evil after the bald villain freezes himself and unthaws in the '90s? With the help of sexy sidekick Vanessa Kensington, he just might.
movies.tagline: If he were any cooler, he'd still be frozen, baby!

movies.title: Av: The Hunt
movies.overview: Police officer Sedat raids a derelict apartment squatted by a young couple. The man is killed, the young woman, Ayşe, escapes. When her friends and relatives offer no help, Ayşe is forced to steal cash and a car from her father and flee town like an outlaw. The chase goes deeper into the wild. Along with three men he has recruited, Sedat is pursuing her, out to kill in the name of honour. Taking off from the suburbs of Anatolia, Av: The Hunt continues reaching breath-taking natural landscapes, and recounts how a young woman is pulled into spiral of violence while trying to escape the patriarchal society she lives in.

movies.title: Ave Maryam
movies.overview: A devoted nun who cares for her elder sisters must choose between upholding her vows or pursuing her forbidden feelings for a fascinating pastor.

movies.title: Avengement
movies.overview: While on a prison furlough, a lowly criminal evades his guards and returns to his old stomping ground to take revenge on the people who turned him into a cold blooded killer.
movies.tagline: He's out for blood

movies.title: Awake
movies.overview: After a sudden global event wipes out all electronics and takes away humankind’s ability to sleep, chaos quickly begins to consume the world. Only Jill, an ex-soldier with a troubled past, may hold the key to a cure in the form of her own daughter. The question is, can Jill safely deliver her daughter and save the world before she herself loses her mind.
movies.tagline: Disorientation. Hallucinations. Hysteria. Sleep is survival.

movies.title: Awara Paagal Deewana
movies.overview: Awara Paagal Deewana ((Hindi: आवारा पागल दीवाना), English: Wayward, Crazy, Insane) is a 2002 Bollywood action comedy directed by Vikram Bhatt. The film's music was composed by Anu Malik, and the lyrics by Sameer. Reduced to a henpecked husband, his dream of making it big and being independent in the USA, Dr. Anmol Acharya is, in short, disillusioned and sad. He is not alone, he has his father-in-law, Manilal in the same leaky boat with him. Then this family has a new neighbor, namely Gulu Gulab Khatri. They find out that he a crime lord from India, and has a price-tag of two crore rupees on his head. Anmol and Manilal's wife want their respective husbands to go to India and arrange to hand-over Khatri, so they can collect the dough. Anmol and Manilal do go to India, but things don't go well as planned, and the hapless duo end up as hostages by Chota Chatri and Yeda Anna, who have orders to kill Khatri, and anyone else who gets in their way.
movies.tagline: Bollywood's answer to The Whole Nine Yards

movies.title: Awon Boyz
movies.overview: This documentary takes a close look at the lives and passions of the men and boys who hustle or run with a gang on the streets of Lagos.

movies.title: Ayana
movies.overview: An ambitious software entrepreneur puts everything he has in line to perceive his dreams.

movies.title: Ayinla
movies.overview: Set against the backdrop of a beautiful range of hills and valleys in the southwestern Nigerian countryside, AYINLA is inspired by the life and times of Ayinla Omowura, a popular Yoruba musician in rural Nigeria.

movies.title: Brother in Love
movies.overview: A robbery leaves a proprietor penniless before his wedding, but becoming a son-in-law to a second family might be the financial solution he needs.

movies.title: Brother in Love 2
movies.overview: On the eve of his wedding, a young man must deal with the trouble caused by an unexpected guest — his bride's former brother-in-law.

movies.originalTitle: Ayotzinapa, el Paso de la Tortuga
movies.title: Ayotzinapa: The Turtle's Pace
movies.overview: A film about the 43 students from Ayotzinapa who disappeared.

movies.title: Azali
movies.overview: 14-year-old Amina from northern Ghana gets sent away to Burkina Faso by her mother to prevent her marriage to an elderly man. However, fate intervenes in the form of kidnappers who bring her to Accra.  What trials and tribulations await Amina in the slums of Accra?  Will she ever find a way to escape?
movies.tagline: Thrust into Accra by circumstances, a 14-year-old girl from northern Ghana must endure life in the slums of Accra and find a way to get back home

movies.title: Aziz Ansari: Buried Alive
movies.overview: Standup comedian Aziz Ansari ("Parks and Recreation") headlines his third standup special, where he shares his uniquely hilarious perspective on fears of adulthood, babies, marriage, and more. Ansari's look at life on the cusp of 30 years old is smart, unfiltered, and hysterical.
movies.tagline: 30 comes at you fast.

movies.originalTitle: Aziz Ansari: Live at Madison Square Garden
movies.title: Aziz Ansari: Live at Madison Square Garden
movies.overview: Ansari headlines the iconic Madison Square Garden and delivers his most hilarious and insightful stand-up yet. Filmed in front of a sold-out audience, Ansari's latest special is an uproarious document of the comic in top form -- covering topics ranging from the struggle of American immigrants to the food industry to relationships to gender inequality.

movies.title: Aziz Ansari: Nightclub Comedian
movies.overview: After another year of lockdowns, Aziz takes the stage to skewer pandemic life, quarantines, vaccine cards, celebrity side-gigs, smartphones and more.

movies.title: Aziz Ansari: Right Now
movies.overview: In a comedy special directed by Spike Jonze, Aziz Ansari shares deep personal insights and hilarious takes on wokeness, family and the social climate.

movies.title: Stuck Apart
movies.overview: Entrenched in a midlife crisis, Aziz seeks solace from his mundane job, lonesome friends and rowdy family while pretending to have his act together.

movies.title: Love Like You
movies.overview: A young girl, with a troubled past, and a young boy fall in love in a small but beautiful town.

movies.title: Love Tactics
movies.overview: An ad executive and a fashion designer-blogger don't believe in love, so they place a bet to make the other fall head over heels - with unusual tactics.

movies.title: Love Likes Coincidences
movies.overview: Year 1977, a September morning in Ankara... Yilmaz tries to rush his pregnant wife Neriman to the hospital and he crushes into Omer's car. This accident causes Omer's pregnant wife Inci, who was in the back seat, to have a pre-term labor. The babies are born on the same day. They see each other for the first time... This accident is the threshold of the coincidences that bring Ozgur and Deniz together.

movies.title: Love Likes Coincidences 2
movies.overview: An unforgettable love that overcomes all obstacles, even time, distance and falling apart.

movies.title: Doom of Love
movies.overview: After his ad agency goes bankrupt, an indebted Fırat falls for a singer at a yoga retreat and joins her on a journey of self-realization.

movies.title: B. A. Pass 2
movies.overview: B. A. Pass 2 is the story of a young girl, who, in order to achieve her goals and to avoid marriage, makes a few wrong decisions and adopts ill habits that eventually ruin her life.

movies.title: Baba Parası
movies.overview: A group of siblings that share nothing but a father come together after the patriarch's death to compete for his fortune. He left a save for his children, but took the password to the grave with him.

movies.title: The Girl and the Gun
movies.overview: A department store saleslady has had enough of being an underdog. One night, she discovers a peculiar-looking gun right on her doorstep. Her life drastically changes as she discovers how much power owning a gun can give her.

movies.title: My Father's Violin
movies.overview: Through their shared grief and connection to music, an orphaned girl bonds with her emotionally aloof, successful violinist uncle.

movies.title: Baby Blood
movies.overview: A cruel circus owner beats and abuses his pregnant wife. One day the circus receives a leopard newly captured in Africa, but the animal soon dies. However, an evil creature that was inside the leopard bursts out of the animal's body, burrows into the wife's body and takes over her fetus. It soon starts demanding blood, and the woman goes searching for victims for her new "baby."
movies.tagline: It's time to feed the baby.

movies.title: Baby Mamas
movies.overview: The daily lives and loves of four professional women in South Africa who are all in different stages of their own real-life baby mama drama.

movies.title: Back of the Net
movies.overview: A new student at a soccer academy is determined to beat her rival's team in the national tournament.
movies.tagline: Out of the classroom and onto the pitch.

movies.title: Back to Q82
movies.overview: Eager to rejoin her divorced parents, an inventor's daughter drives his time-traveling car back to 1982. But a secret crush accidentally follows.

movies.title: Back to the Outback
movies.overview: Tired of being locked in a reptile house where humans gawk at them like they are monsters, a ragtag group of Australia’s deadliest creatures plot an escape from their zoo to the Outback, a place where they’ll fit in without being judged.
movies.tagline: Dangerously cute and on the loose

movies.title: Backtrace
movies.overview: The lone surviving thief of a violent armored car robbery is sprung from a high security facility and administered an experimental drug.
movies.tagline: Some crimes never let you go

movies.title: Bad Boys
movies.overview: Marcus Burnett is a hen-pecked family man. Mike Lowry is a foot-loose and fancy free ladies' man. Both are Miami policemen, and both have 72 hours to reclaim a consignment of drugs stolen from under their station's nose. To complicate matters, in order to get the assistance of the sole witness to a murder, they have to pretend to be each other.
movies.tagline: Whatcha gonna do?

movies.title: Bad Boys II
movies.overview: Out-of-control, trash-talking buddy cops Marcus Burnett and Mike Lowrey of the Miami Narcotics Task Force reunite, and bullets fly, cars crash and laughs explode as they pursue a whacked-out drug lord from the streets of Miami to the barrios of Cuba. But the real fireworks result when Marcus discovers that playboy Mike is secretly romancing Marcus’ sexy sister.
movies.tagline: If you can't stand the heat, get out of Miami.

movies.title: Bad Trip
movies.overview: Two pals embark on a road trip full of funny pranks that pull real people into mayhem.
movies.tagline: Friendships run deep.

movies.title: The Skin of the Wolf
movies.overview: Martinón is the last inhabitant of Auzal, a village in the mountains where he lives in communion with nature. He only goes down to the valleys twice a year to trade and to buy provisions. But one day he’s convinced to take a wife, a decision intended to soften his calloused soul—but in some ways his real struggle is only just beginning.

movies.title: Below Zero
movies.overview: When a prisoner transfer van is attacked, the cop in charge must fight those inside and outside while dealing with a silent foe: the icy temperatures.
movies.tagline: Escape is not the exit.

movies.title: Lost Bullet
movies.overview: A small time delinquent, turned police mechanic for a go fast task force, is forced to defend his innocence when his mentor is killed by dirty cops.

movies.title: Lost Bullet 2
movies.overview: Having cleared his name, genius mechanic Lino has only one goal in mind: getting revenge on the corrupt cops who killed his brother and his mentor.

movies.title: The Resistance Banker
movies.overview: In the occupied Netherlands during World War II, banker Walraven van Hall is asked to use his financial contacts to help the Dutch resistance. With his brother Gijs, he comes up with a risky plan to take out huge loans and use the money to finance the Resistance.
movies.tagline: The greatest concealed act of resistance

movies.title: Street Flow
movies.overview: Noumouké, from the suburb of Paris, is about to decide which brother's foot steps to follow - the lawyer student Soulaymaan or the gangster Demba.

movies.title: Bantú Mama
movies.overview: A French woman of African descent manages to escape after being arrested in the Dominican Republic. She finds shelter in the most dangerous district of Santo Domingo, where she is taken in by a group of children. By becoming their protégée and maternal figure, she will see her destiny change inexorably.
movies.tagline: A contemporary tale about a different kind of re-encounter between Africa and the Caribbean.

movies.title: A Cut Above
movies.overview: With his mom's salon on the brink of bankruptcy, a dedicated son rolls up his sleeves to help and discovers himself as the coolest barber on the block.

movies.title: Barbie & Chelsea: The Lost Birthday
movies.overview: Enjoy high-sea thrills as Barbie, Chelsea and the rest of the Roberts family set sail on an adventure cruise.  "Barbie & Chelsea The Lost Birthday" tells the story of Chelsea, Barbie’s precocious youngest sister, and the rest of the Roberts family as they set sail on an adventure cruise for her seventh birthday. When they cross the International Date Line, Chelsea discovers her actual birthday has been lost and she embarks on a fantastical journey through an enchanted jungle island in order to save it.

movies.title: Barbie: Big City, Big Dreams
movies.overview: Barbie swaps the sunny shores of Malibu for the bright lights of Broadway to attend an excusive summer performing arts program and meets…Barbie!  Fast friends, the two discover they share more than a name as they explore New York City and all the amazing things they have in common.  As they compete for the coveted once-in-a-lifetime Spotlight Solo from Times Square, the friends discover competition isn’t all about winning, it’s about striving to be your best, overcoming doubts, and sharing the spotlight.

movies.title: Barbie: Dolphin Magic
movies.overview: Barbie and her sisters take off on another exciting, global adventure to visit their friend Ken at his summer internship at a beautiful and exotic coral reef.

movies.title: Barbie: Princess Adventure
movies.overview: With new friends in a new kingdom, Barbie learns what it means to be herself when she trades places with a royal lookalike in this musical adventure.

movies.title: Barbie: The Princess & The Popstar
movies.overview: Tori is a blonde princess who is bored of living her royal life, and has dreams of becoming a popstar. Keira, on the other hand, is a brunette popstar who dreams of being a princess. When the two meet, they magically trade places, but after realising it is best to be themselves.
movies.tagline: True friends rock in perfect harmony!

movies.originalTitle: Barbra: The Music ... The Mem'ries ... The Magic!
movies.title: Barbra: The Music ... The Mem'ries ... The Magic!
movies.overview: Iconic songstress Barbra Streisand culminates her 13-city tour in Miami with dazzling ballads, Broadway standards and stories from behind the scenes.

movies.title: Barcelona: A Love Untold
movies.overview: Ely, a young man who can't get over Celine, his past love, meets Mia, a young woman who escaped from a painful past in the Philippines and is trying her luck to rebuild her life in Spain. They meet. They fall in love. But can they overcome the hurt of the past to have a future together?

movies.originalTitle: Bardo, falsa crónica de unas cuantas verdades
movies.title: BARDO, False Chronicle of a Handful of Truths
movies.overview: A renowned Mexican journalist and documentary filmmaker living in Los Angeles, after being named the recipient of a prestigious international award, is compelled to return to his native country, unaware that this simple trip will push him to an existential limit.
movies.tagline: Experience a state of mind.

movies.title: Barry
movies.overview: A biopic of Barack Obama set during his time as a college student in New York City.
movies.tagline: Before he was Barack, he was Barry

movies.title: Bartkowiak
movies.overview: After his brother dies in a car crash, a disgraced MMA fighter takes over the family nightclub — and soon learns his sibling's death wasn’t an accident.
